text: The first picture, against the light, you saw of me. You chose to chat with me and that would be the start of an incredible love story.
Do you remember the moment we met? I will certainly never forget.
You did so many trajects for seeing me. I felt bad for letting you move in the night from Antipolo to Manila or the contrary.
Our first trip, we went to Tagaytay just few days after we met. It was fun, I loved it!
You introduced me to your friend for the first time. I learned a lot about you but from someone else this time.
I started to share with you my every day. Even going to the grocery was a good time to chat you. Is there a day I did not chat you?
Waking up everyday beside you was the best mornings in my whole life. How many times did I just stare at you sleeping peacefully?
Everyday, I cooked for you and you were surprised I could actually cook. I told you, I am good house wife. Haha!
I was really happy when you sent me this picture. You were smiling with my gift around your arms.
We went out with some of your friends once again in Metrowalk. It was cool. I liked this moment where we were whispering to each other.
You wanted to sleep but the weak drinker me died before you even got tipsy. Ouchhh!
You made me discover Taft (Happy T). And once again, I ended up dead. It was a real challenge for you to take me home. Sorry, Bebe.
First time for me, I went to you in Antipolo. We went to the concert there and had some fun.
Haha we went for the first time in Ace Spa. You were so sexy in your swimsuit and baby you are the crazy one I want for life. You made this moment!
I love your gift so much! Why do you think even after it unfortunately broke, I still have the picture behind my phone?
Those days with you were wonderful. You decide to pass this end of the year with me instead of your family. You made me fall for you so hard!
THE BEST NEW YEAR EVER! You just transformed me that day, when I think about this day I cry now when I think about it because I felt happy like never before.
Do you remember this scene? You called me and I was under the shower.
After breaking up, we came back together and bought my first guitar.
Our first trip to Baguio, we were starting to be really in our own world. You are so cute.
It was a nice trip Bebe. If you didn't come, it would have been really different.
The moment you noticed the 'tabo' was really funny! See I am becoming Asian.
The first time we went to a breakout room. I love this picture because we are both laughing out loud.
You stare at me a lot when I sleep. Thank you for taking care of me even when I sleep.
You make me happy everyday as you can see on this picture. I have a big smile and playing loco loco.
We went to the birthday of Davi and it was the first time I heard you singing on a karaoke. You have a nice voice.
I took even more PTO for enjoying my time with you.
I gave your name to my guitar and signed it.
I improved slowly following your teaching.
You are so sexy my sweetheart. I hope I could be the guitar here.
You managed to capture not only this picture where I was truly happy but my heart too.
This picture makes me think to much about a wedding picture.
We kissed in the middle of the LGBT event in Manila. It's like the time stopped.
First time I went to the Chinatown of Manila. Discovering every places with you was so nice. You made everything unforgettable !
Another night out in BGC, I did not end up completely drunk this time.
First time my little baby went to work in Manila. A big step!
I dont mind being and looking ridiculous because it always makes you smile! That's what is important for me.
Hydro Manila! It was fun and I am sorry I ruined the event by getting mad at you for accidentally destroying my phone. It will never happen again.
The day our favorite mirror got installed. Did you like it?
Apparently, yes.
I am always here for you when you are crying like this day. Count on me baby, I will always try to help you.
Haa this bus ! Do you remember what happenned inside ?
Happy Birthday Sweetheart! You did not even notice me preparing everything for it. It's an important date for me!
Subic was really a nice trip. The sunset, the tent! Mwah, unforgettable! You are crazy and I love it.
I wonder how many times did we go to Megamall together? But with you, it was always interesting.
Our matching tattoo. I love it, it belong only to us. Would you be ok to have another one together?
This day I was actually waiting you at the airport for hours. I actually walked to the airport from Mandaluyong. Impressive, right?
When you dont expect it, I always send you stupid picture.
At that time, I was already plotting my proposal. Yes, it was around the moment I totally made my mind.
First time you saw me wearing corporate clothes. How was it baby? Do I look nice?
Our first Christmas together. You gave me certainly the most incredible gift ever given to me. You were pregnant and you're gonna make me a Dad.
This year was A-M-A-Z-I-N-G! I wanna see all the next following New Years with you with our children.
Just after the New Year, we went to Poblacion to take pictures with my new camera.
We went to Cloud 9. On the side, I was thinking only about my proposal.
My sister was visitting, so we went to Intramuros once again. Did I tell you I love this white dress? You look wonderful
The day time stopped! I put my knee down and told you the words. I hope this moment is etched into your memory forever.
Late Valentines date. I like when we have matching clothes Baby. Can we buy our clothes together and match them?
Thank you so much for this journey! It was a really nice trip. I cannot say thanks enough to your family. They accepted me and I appreciate that so much.
The balcony was certainly our favorite spot in Mandaluyong. How many times did we just sit there?
Haha! Did you like me being your sister in crime?
The virus going stronger during that time, I was really scared to go out catching the virus and come back and to pass it to you.
I am not earning a lot in Philippines but I always try to give you what you like.
This image need to be compared with the one from 19 May 2019. I passed to an electric guitar and you put your book down for something else.
The date when we started our Team KD adventure. I should have started earlier.
You were sad for not being able to go out like before. But with a baby coming and the virus, we could only go outside to a restaurant. You seem to like it though.
welcome deep t...! Hahaha!
And the magic happened! I did not realize at this moment. I was shocked. Me, Kevin, just me, I will be taking care with you of a little baby.
From that point, I will try to do everything to make the both of you happy. I will not be someone who won't take responsibilities.
I know it's hard but you are an exceptional mother, baby. Don't be too hard on yourself.
The first monthsary of our little Celine!
When I get some free time, I always try to put my attention on you and her. I love you both!
She started to smile in my arms. But even more, this moment made you smile too.
When you start buying diapers and wonder what size you should buy is the moment you realize you really are a daddy.
Even on my professional decisions, you are always here for helping me. You are so helpful and you have a big heart!
Partner in crime. Whatever we do, we always do it together.
And our little monster started to become a fat monster. I guess the food is good. Wait, I think I know. Haha!
Our first real trip as a family, it was nice to go out after so many months of quarantine.
I am trying to help you as much as I can. I know it's hard but I do my best for taking the relay particularly when you lose it completely...
Time pass and she starts to be a mini Kevin. She got many things from me.
The good part about having a baby is you are not as sad as before. It seems you find happiness in watching her grow and only that makes me happy.
I work a lot now but I'm always gonna give my free time to what is important, the happiness of you and her.
I want more moments like this one. I wanna take you both everywhere. I want to discover things with you and later we would talk about it to our grandchildren.
There is no day without me thinking about you or her. My world revolves only around both of you now and for the rest of my life.
We got so much fun around that table with her, right ? She always manage to make us laugh by showing us new things.
I love you both. You are my everyday treasure!
We are unfortunately not married yet but we will be this year. For the moment, let's celebrate our 1 year engagement. It was a nice day. I love you my Diane.
